content.en: Robotic algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of robotics. These algorithms, such as the PLPE neural network, adaptive dynamic programming (ADP), and recurrent neural network (RNN), are used to achieve decentralized control, fault tolerance, and optimal performance for modular and reconfigurable robot manipulators. By implementing these algorithms, scientists aim to improve the effectiveness, accuracy, and adaptability of robots in uncertain and complex environments.
content.da: Robotalgoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for robotteknologi. Disse algoritmer, såsom PLPE neurale netværk, adaptiv dynamisk programmering (ADP) og rekurrente neurale netværk (RNN), bruges til at opnå decentraliseret kontrol, fejltolerance og optimal ydeevne for modulære og rekonfigurerbare robotmanipulatorer. Ved at implementere disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre robotternes effektivitet, nøjagtighed og tilpasningsevne i usikre og komplekse miljøer.
